newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Gintian turns to losses in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Gintian turns to losses in 1996.

text.p: (in millions of yuan unless stated, against 1995 figures)
Earnings per share -0.08 yuan vs 0.18 yuan
Net assets per share 3.28 yuan vs 4.00 yuan
Company name: Gintian Industry (Group) Co Ltd.
Note: The results, under Chinese accounting standards, were published in an annual report in the Shenzhen-based Securities Times on Wednesday.
The report gave no figures based on international standards, and a company official said they were not immediately available.
The company's board of directors proposed no dividend for 1996, pending approval of shareholders at a meeting on May 30, it said.
Trading in Gintian's A and B shares was suspended on Wednesday morning and will resume in the afternoon, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange has said.
